Posts.EditableText:
# New Name: EightOne (8ne)

---

Since I would like to present all my projects under a neutral name in the future I have made a (really last) name change. I will list my libraries here again under new names.

I hope that I have finally removed all clarifications. üòÅ

---

**[You want to see all libraries of eightone? Just click here!](https://github.com/8ne/quest_libraries)**

---

*Furthermore I wish you a lot of fun with the libraries!*

![EightOne](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/8ne/quest_libraries/master/8ne.png)

---

**[Website](https://www.eightone.de/) | [E-Mail](mailto:kontakt@eightone.de) | [GitHub](https://github.com/8ne) | [Libraries](https://github.com/8ne/quest_libraries)**

New Name: EightOne (8ne)

Since I would like to present all my projects under a neutral name in the future I have made a (really last) name change. I will list my libraries here again under new names.

I hope that I have finally removed all clarifications. üòÅ

You want to see all libraries of eightone? Just click here!

Furthermore I wish you a lot of fun with the libraries!
